appearance.colors_text: Choose two colors to theme your forum with. The first will be used as a highlight color, while the second will be used to style background elements.
appearance.custom_styles_text: Customize your forum's appearance by adding your own Less/CSS code to be applied on top of Flarum's default styles.
appearance.description: Customize your forum's colors, logos, and other variables.
appearance.enter_hex_message: Please enter a hexadecimal color code.
appearance.favicon_text: Upload an image to be displayed as the forum's shortcut icon.
appearance.logo_text: Upload an image to be displayed in place of the forum title.
appearance.title: Appearance

basics.description: Set your forum title, language, and other basic settings.
basics.display_name_text: Select the driver that should be used for users' display names. By default, the username is shown.
basics.forum_description_text: Enter a short sentence or two that describes your community. This will appear in the meta tag and show up in search engines.
basics.home_page_text: Choose the page which users will first see when they visit your forum.
basics.slug_driver_text: Select a driver to be used for slugging this model.
basics.title: Basics
basics.welcome_banner_text: Configure the text that displays in the banner on the All Discussions page. Use this to welcome guests to your forum.

edit_css.customize_text: Customize your forum's appearance by adding your own Less/CSS code to be applied on top of Flarum's default styles.
edit_css.title: Edit Custom CSS

edit_group.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this group? The group members will NOT be deleted.
edit_group.title: Create Group

email.description: Configure the driver, settings and addresses your forum will use to send email.
email.not_sending_message: Flarum currently does not send emails. This can be due to the selected driver, or errors in its configuration.
email.send_test_mail_text: This will send an email using the above configuration to your email, {email}.
email.title: => core.ref.email

extension.confirm_uninstall: Uninstalling will remove all database entries and assets related to the extension. Are you sure you want to continue?
extension.enable_to_see: Enable the extension to view and change settings.

permissions.description: Configure who can see and do what.

activate_account.subject: เปิดใช้งานบัญชีใหม่ของคุณ
activate_account.body:
สวัสดี {username}!

บางคน(หวังว่าจะเป็นคุณ!) ได้สมัครสมาชิกเพื่อใช้งาน {forum} ด้วยที่อยู่อีเมลนี้

ถ้าเป็นคุณเพียงแค่คลิกลิงก์ต่อไปนี้และบัญชีของคุณจะถูกเปิดใช้งาน
{url}

หากคุณไม่ได้สมัครสมาชิกเพื่อใช้งานไม่ต้องสนใจอีเมลนี้

confirm_email.subject: ยืนยันที่อยู่อีเมลใหม่ของคุณ
confirm_email.body:
สวัสดี {username}!

บางคน(หวังว่าจะเป็นคุณ!) ได้เปลี่ยนที่อยู่อีเมลของพวกเขาใน {forum} เป็นที่อยู่อีเมลนี้

ถ้าเป็นคุณเพียงแค่คลิกลิงก์ต่อไปนี้และอีเมลของคุณจะได้รับการยืนยัน
{url}

หากคุณไม่ใช่คุณไม่ต้องสนใจอีเมลนี้

send_test.subject: Flarum Email Test
send_test.body:
Hey {username}!

This is a test email to confirm that your Flarum email configuration is working properly.

If this was you, this email means that your configuration works!

If this was not you, please ignore this email.
